strapiPost.title: The Community Award Goes To...
strapiPost.content:
Rockin' Baker, a community bakery located in Fayetteville, trains and employs individuals who are on the Autism spectrum.

  • Daymara Baker, founder of Rockin' Baker started a Chef's Challenge where local well known chefs in NWA provide the students with a few ingredients that they turn into a specialty bread.
  • Participating Chefs include Chef Simon from Blake Street House in Bentonville, Chef Chrissy from Mocking Bird Kitchen in Fayetteville, and more to come!

You can listen to the encouraging story HERE. You can learn more about Rockin' Baker by visiting their site, HERE.
